main event: A witness reported seeing a white-glowing elongated object moving in a NW to SE direction over Maywood, Illinois on April 13, 1962, which changed shape and reversed direction during the observation.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 3-4 minutes,The object appeared blurred or fuzzy and seemed to oscillate or vibrate during the sighting,There were comments suggesting that it was a probable air vehicle rather than a misidentification,The object disappeared behind clouds and reappeared several times during the observation,Details regarding its shape and movement were consistent with those seen in other UFO reports.
witness description: A former radio operator with experience in observing the night sky.
